mapping.eigenschappen: [{% for key, element in attribute(attribute(attribute(attribute(attribute(_context, 'SOAP-ENV:Body'), 'ns2:OntvangenIntakeNotificatie'), 'Body'), 'SIMXML'), 'ELEMENTEN') %}{% if not loop.first %},{% endif %}{{ map('https://simxml.nl/mapping/simxml.elementToZaakEigenschap.mapping.json', [key, element])|json_encode }}{% endfor %}]
mapping.zaakinformatieobjecten: {%if 0 in attribute(attribute(attribute(attribute(_context, 'SOAP-ENV:Body'), 'ns2:OntvangenIntakeNotificatie'), 'ns2:Bijlagen'), 'ns2:Bijlage')|keys %}[{% for bijlage in attribute(attribute(attribute(attribute(_context, 'SOAP-ENV:Body'), 'ns2:OntvangenIntakeNotificatie'), 'ns2:Bijlagen'), 'ns2:Bijlage') %}{% if not loop.first %},{% endif %}{{ map('https://simxml.nl/mapping/simxml.simxmlToZGWDocument.mapping.json', bijlage)|json_encode }}{% endfor %}]{% else %}{% set bijlage = attribute(attribute(attribute(attribute(_context, 'SOAP-ENV:Body'), 'ns2:OntvangenIntakeNotificatie'), 'ns2:Bijlagen'), 'ns2:Bijlage') %}[{{ map('https://simxml.nl/mapping/simxml.simxmlToZGWDocument.mapping.json', bijlage)|json_encode }}]{% endif %}
